sentences: Gregory Herbert (May 19, 1947 â€“ January 31, 1978) was an American jazz saxophonist and flautist.
In 1964 he did a short stint in the Duke Ellington Orchestra, then studied at Temple University from 1965 to 1971.
While a student he recorded with Pat Martino in 1968.
From 1971 to 1975 he toured with Woody Herman, then played with Harold Danko in 1975 and the Thad Jones/Mel Lewis Orchestra from  1975 to 1977.
Additionally, Herbert appeared on Chet Baker's Once Upon a Summertime in 1977 along with Harold Danko, Ron Carter and Mel Lewis.
Herbert died of a heroin overdose in Amsterdam in 1978.
